refnamediv.refpurpose: This function finds a solution for linear equation Ax = b over a prime Galois field.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [X, SFLAG] = gflineq(A, B) [X, SFLAG]= gflineq(A, B, P)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: [X, SFLAG] = gflineq(A, B) returns a particular solution (X) of AX=B in GF(2). If the equation has no solution, then X is empty and SFLAG = 0 else SFLAG = 1.
[X, SFLAG]= gflineq(A, B, P) returns a particular solution of the linear equation A X = B in GF(P) and SFLAG=1. If the equation has no solution, then X is empty and SFLAG = 0.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: A=[1 0 1; 1 1 0; 1 1 1] p=3 [x,vld] = gflineq(A,[1;0;1],p) disp(A,'A=') disp(x,'x='); if(vld) disp('Linear equation has solution x') else disp('Linear equation has no solution and x is empty') end disp( pmodulo(A*x,p),'B =')
